ðŸ“– Summary: Helium is a Python library that simplifies web automation by providing a high-level API on top of Selenium. It allows developers to interact with web elements using user-visible labels instead of complex selectors, resulting in shorter, more readable, and more stable scripts. Helium also simplifies common tasks like iFrame interaction and window management.
